doc:
Danny Mann https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_Mann 0 Daniel "Danny" Mann (born July 28, 1951) is an American voice actor, writer, singer, musician and production manager best known for his voices of Hector in Heathcliff and the Catillac Cats, Freeway, Cloudraker and Lightspeed in Transformers, Backwoods Beagle in DuckTales, Kaltag in Balto, Ferdinand in Babe and Serge in the Open Season franchise. Daniel_"_Danny_"_Mann ( born July_28_,_1951 ) is an_American_voice_actor , writer_,_singer_,_musician_and_production_manager best known for his_voices of Hector in Heathcliff and the_Catillac_Cats , Freeway , Cloudraker_and_Lightspeed in Transformers , Backwoods_Beagle in DuckTales , Kaltag in Balto , Ferdinand in Babe_and_Serge in the_Open_Season_franchise .
